elements.name: When a GET request containing valid authorization credentials and incorrect customer id data is sent to the
elements.description:
/api/get-user endpoint, the expected status code returned should be 404, and the message in the response
  body should confirm: "user not found".

steps.name: The api user constructs the base url with the "admin" token.
The api user sets "api/get-user" path parameters
The api user prepares a GET request containing the incorrect customer 2564 to send to the api get User endpoint.
The api user saves the response returned from the api get User endpoint and confirms that the status code is '404' and the reason phrase is Not Found.

name: As an administrator, I should be able to access detailed information of the user with the
description: specified id number via API connection.
